name: WANT TO ENJOY YOUR TIME IN ANKARA?? THIS TRIP IS ABSOLUTELY FOR YOU! HAVE A LOOK AND SEE HOW MANY GOOD EXPERİENCE YOU CAN HAVE !
description: You can see Ankara Castle  ,Atatürk's Mausoleum , Hamamönü( special Ankara Houeses), Kızılay ( city center ), Ulus ( the old part of Ankara with some historical structures). We can also go some museums up to your choice because there are a lot of museums like art , picture, history, stamps, old Ottoman Empires 'dresses and furnitures. We can go to the places where we can eat really delicious Türkish foods and drinks. They can see the some villages of Ankara . We can go to the mosques where they can see the people doing worship.  If they want to have some fun we can go to the huge amusement park .ı will show them really good places to buy souvenirs or anything else. I wil show them how turkish people really live in Ankara .
